server package¶

Submodules¶

server.add_user module¶

class server.add_user.RegisterUser(database, server)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

Interface window class that implements the registration of a new user on the server. The class constructor takes positional arguments of the server database objects and the server itself.

save_data()¶

The method of adding user data to the database. Includes checking the filling of each field, hashing the user’s password, when saving.

server.config_window module¶

class server.config_window.ConfigWindow(config)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

The class of the server configuration settings window. The class constructor takes as a positional argument the configuration object of the basic server settings (parse from .ini file).

open_file_dialog()¶

Method of processing the user opening a directory to select a database file.

save_server_config()¶

The method of saving settings in .ini file. Enables validation of user-entered values.

server.delete_user module¶

class server.delete_user.DelUserDialog(database, server)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

A dialog box class that allows you to select a user and delete it from the database. The class constructor takes positional arguments of the server database objects and the server itself.

all_users_fill()¶

A method that selects users and databases and fills in the selection list in the window

remove_user()¶

The method that removes the user from the database

server.server_core module¶

class server.server_core.MessageProcessor(listen_address, listen_port, database)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

The main class of the server. Accepts connections, dictionary packets from clients, processes incoming messages. Works as a separate thread. The constructor accepts positional arguments: the values of the ip address and port on which it will be launched, and the database object.

autorize_user(message, sock)¶

A method that implements user authorization. Users must first be registered on the server. Therefore, if the user is not in the database, 400 response is returned.

init_socket()¶

A method of creating and configuring a server socket.

port¶
process_client_message(message, client)¶

A method that implements the processing of a message from a client.

process_message(message)¶

The method of sending messages to the client. Enables user verification in the list of connected users. If it is not there, then the user deletion function is called.

remove_client(client)¶

The handler method of the client which the connection was interrupted. Removes the client from the list of connected users and from the server database.

run()¶

A method that implements the main flow cycle. Overloaded method of the parent Thread class

service_update_lists()¶

A method that implements sending a message to clients about updating the list of registered users. Response (205).

server.server_db module¶

class server.server_db.ServerWarehouse(path)¶

Bases: object

class Users(username)¶

Bases: object

class UsersActive(user_id, host, port, time_login)¶

Bases: object

Bases: object

Bases: object

server.server_main_window module¶

class server.server_main_window.MainWindow(database, server, config)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

The class of the main window of the server interface. The class constructor accepts three positional arguments: a database object, a server class object, and an object with server configuration settings

create_users_model()¶

A method that implements the formation and filling of a table of active users from the server database.

reg_user()¶

Method that creates a new user registration window.

rem_user()¶

Method that creates a user deletion window.

server_config()¶

The method that creates the server configuration settings window.

show_statistics()¶

A method that creates a customer statistics window.

server.stat_window module¶

class server.stat_window.StatWindow(database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

Class of the interface window displaying client statistics. The class constructor takes a server database object as a positional argument.

create_stat_model()¶

A method that generates and fills a statistics table with data from the database
